Metadata.Title: CVE-2024-27316 affecting package mod_http2 for versions less than 2.0.29-3
Metadata.Description: CVE-2024-27316 affecting package mod_http2 for versions less than 2.0.29-3. An upgraded version of the package is available that resolves this issue.

Criterion.Comment: Package mod_http2 is earlier than 2.0.29-3, affected by CVE-2024-27316
